Our Standards

We aim to provide good quality food, delivered at the correct temperature - either chilled, frozen or hot. If the meal is unsatisfactory in any way, the payment will be refunded.

Our recommendation

If the meal is supplied hot, we recommend that it should be eaten as soon as it is delivered to ensure optimum quality and safety. No part of a hot delivered or reheated meal should ever be saved for later in the day.
